headline: L3Harris Demonstrates Interoperable Network to Unify Department of War and U.S. Government Agencies
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., December 11, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) hosted U.S. government officials for a first-of-its-kind demonstration of software-defined capabilities that enable separate federal agencies to communicate instantly across domains.

raw.headline: L3Harris Demonstrates Interoperable Network to Unify Department of War and U.S. Government Agencies
raw.summary: ARLINGTON, Va., December 11, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) hosted U.S. government officials for a first-of-its-kind demonstration of software-defined capabilities that enable separate federal agencies to communicate instantly across domains.

headline: L3Harris Wins Contract to Produce Propulsion Units for GMLRS
summary: LHX secures a follow-on GMLRS propulsion unit contract worth up to $200M, marking its largest award for 12 months.

raw.headline: L3Harris Wins Contract to Produce Propulsion Units for GMLRS
raw.summary: LHX secures a follow-on GMLRS propulsion unit contract worth up to $200M, marking its largest award for 12 months.

headline: How Is Kratos Defense Benefiting From Surging SRM Demand?
summary: KTOS gains momentum as its affordable rocket and SRM technologies drive hypersonic testing demand.
